title: Can someone help
body:
Guys im thinking on getting pro on league but i have a bad pc and it gives me low fps in the game 
I hate to say this but this game made me like it more than cod 
I know this sound crazy but if you guys have any "old" pc that can supp league with good fps so it dont lag i would really appreciate it 
I work also but my money is not enough for saving for a pc 
Right now im silv 5 
Last season was Silv 2 
My mmr from last seas was for G2 division

replies.body: LMAO this post is such a meme
If you really had pro potential, you should be able to make it to at least plat no matter how shitty your computer is. Don't blame the computer, blame yourself.
Someone from Fiji actually managed to get Challenger with 300+ ping and a bad computer.

and someone with the best carry stats in the world couldnt make it past gold.

How is shit not adding up for people yet?
